name: Tomas Marks
text: I like this venue very much. theres a happy atmosphere. The cuisine is very tasty. the service is effective and the crew is professional. The cost is modest. extremely recommend.

name: Shawny Ward
text: I wouldn’t recommend this place i bought my food and there was 5 bugs in it no telling how many bugs i had already eaten

name: Baxter stockman
text: The workers were listening to loud Mexican music and dancing in the back. When they finally decided to come help me, they started to talk to me in Spanish. For this reason I left and got food elsewhere.

name: Jeff Marcinkowski
text: Ordered a slice of the stuffed with sausage and pepperoni. Asked if I wanted sauce on the slice I said yes. As I watched him pour it it look like a very watery tomato juice with a few pieces of tomato in it. More than a quarter of the back …More

name: Natalie Llorente
text: I usually love Sbarro’s but this location was awful. Had spinach & mushroom pizza. Basically all of the ingredients were frozen not fresh. I basically paid for a piece bread and some over cooked stale veggies. Gross! Not going back to this location.

name: Ryan S
text: Fantastic yummy pizza. I get the thin crust cheese pizza and I love it.

name: Sandra Luz Machuca
text: The best fast food place in the mall. The food is absolutely delicious and their customer service is outstanding! Would definitely recommend, Veronica is the BEST manager there! :)

name: Roberto Garcia
text: I like their pizza I ordered veggie pizza and some bread sticks very good portions

name: Ruby Gutierrez
text:
Over price for low quality pizza..the the staff members are nice.
I just thing their are better pizza places in the B.C area.

name: John Swank
text: The quality of the pizza just does not compare to other pizza places in the area. Price and service fine. Just average at best pizza .

name: Salim SAYICI
text: Great pizza place they have many options and combos. I wish they have more veggie options.

name: Tony Cooney
text: Pizza was ok. Wish it was a little bit more saucy

name: Michelangelo Broadnax
text: Pizza was delicious and customer service was great!

name: Melissa Hernandez
text: Honestly the pizza tasted so good and you can tell the ingredients are super fresh. One of my go to pizzerias.

name: R. Kevin Schultz
text: The meat was pink and not hot. Into the trash before I got sick.

name: Anthony velazquez
text: Check your receipt or you will be double charged.

name: brendad xddd
text: my pizza was cold

name: Brian Cheeki Breeki Guy
text: Staff is helpful, care about their customers, and will sometime have conversations with you. Have been going since I was little and they keep their word on freshness. They even had calzones before and wish they still had them. Now I buy their stromboli's and they are always delicious and filling!!

name: mike harmon
text: Very good pizza!

name: A Y
text: The lasagna is digusting,don’t recommend this disgusting dish

name: Maria Velazquez
text: I was eating a salad, almost done eating it I realize there was a bee in the plate!!, the cashier gave me a refund, but that is just not acceptable. That totally killed my appetite!

name: Lisa Ohka
text: Sometimes I like there pizza and then that

name: Melvin Smith
text: It's ok

name: tony cooney
text: Yummy pizza

text: Pippa

text: Kind of pricy

text: I love the flavors
